Description: Privately, during the day, you may return home to ask the storyteller any one yes or no question
You think you are a specific town role that is not in play, but your ability doesn’t work
Nightly, poison 1 player until the next night begins
Nightly, choose 3 living players. Each is informed that they have been selected. Each must individually choose whether to live or die. If all choose to live, all die
